title: Episode #26 "Funhouse"
description:
In our amazing Season 2 finale Michael and Steve welcome the one, and only “Big Pussy”, Vinny Pastore. He was a killer, a rat, a gangster and audiences absolutely loved him. Definitely one of the best episodes of the season. Vinny talks about what it was like to be on the best show of all time, and then get whacked at the end of season two. He was devastated at the time but ended up being the first Soprano to take on Hollywood. Vinny is a fantastic guest!

Then after months in the shop the Wing-O-Meter finally makes its historic debut. 

After that Michael and Steve break down one of the most iconic Soprano’s episodes of all time. Never before had TV audiences seen a main character go out like this. Was it really the vindaloo or was Tony just sick about having to take out his best friend. It’s all in Talking Sopranos Episode #26 (Sopranos S-2 Ep #13) “Funhouse”. Make sure to subscribe to the Talking Sopranos podcast wherever you get your podcasts and visit talkingsopranos.com to ask questions and buy official merchandise.
author: talkingsopranos@gmail.com (Michael Imperioli, Steve Schirripa, Vinny Pastore)
